channel.title: Comments on: Dark Matter in the API Universe

item.title: By: valt0r
item.dc:creator: valt0r
item.description: Here is an <a href="http://www.3scale.net/api-management" rel="nofollow">API Management</a> platform that i've been using for my work for a while. Im gonna read more about the other options on the market, but im actually happy with 3scale. I havent had any security problems yet, all monetization as easy as pie, everthing working right i believe, web is 3scale.net, there are other options like apigee and mashery, but couldnt convince me.
item.content:encoded:
Here is an API Management platform that i’ve been using for my work for a while.
Im gonna read more about the other options on the market, but im actually happy with 3scale.
I havent had any security problems yet, all monetization as easy as pie, everthing working right i believe, web is 3scale.net, there are other options like apigee and mashery, but couldnt convince me.

item.description: […] In the late 20th century, scientists began to flirt with proof that there is dark matter in our universe. As we learned that as much as 96% of the mass of the universe is represented by something we cannot observe,...  […]
